original: tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis mdor bstan pa'o //
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis mdor bstan pa'o //
translated: One verse on the summary.üîΩAnd also:

original: de yang / 'phyang ba la ni yongs bsten nas //
analyzed: de yang / 'phyang ba la ni yongs bsten nas //
translated: Having fully relied on the hanging,

original: zhes bya ba ni mchog tu yang dag pa'i bde ba'i rnam pa rnam par shes pa bsam du med par lhag par mos pas byang chub 'thob par byed do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mchog tu yang dag pa'i bde ba'i rnam pa rnam par shes pa bsam du med par lhag par mos pas byang chub 'thob par byed do //

This is the meaning of the passage.

original: las dang las mkhan rnams kyi gang dang gang byed par 'gyur bas lta bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: las dang las mkhan rnams kyi gang dang gang byed par 'gyur bas lta bar 'gyur ro //

original: las de thams cad las brgal ba'i gtso bor 'gyur ro //
analyzed: las de thams cad las brgal ba'i gtso bor 'gyur ro //
translated: One becomes the foremost of all actions.

original: gang gis phyag rgya chen po sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis las mang po dang las kyi dgongs pa rang gi sems kyis rang 'byung ba las bsam du med pa'i gzugs la sogs par dgongs pa'i don to //

translated: The meaning of the passage is that the various actions of the Great Seal arise from one's own mind, which is the inconceivable form and so forth.

original: slar yang 'di'i rgyas par bshad pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: slar yang 'di'i rgyas par bshad pa gsungs pa /

analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /

analyzed: khams thams cad yongs su byung ba'i lus rang gi gnas su mchog gi lce'i bdag nyid can gyi rtsed 'phyang bar rnam par brjod de bshad pa'o //

analyzed: gang gi tshe nyi shu rtsa bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pas de de bzhin du bshad par shes par bya'o //

original: 'di rnams kyi tshad gcig tu mdzad pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi tshad gcig tu mdzad pa gsungs pa /

analyzed: mig ces bya ba ni gnyis so //

original: bug zhes bya ba ni dgu'o //
analyzed: bug zhes bya ba ni dgu'o //

original: zla ba zhes bya ba ni gcig ste de ltar mdor na dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyis lhag pa'i brgya phrag gcig go / khams 'phyang ba po yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: zla ba zhes bya ba ni gcig ste de ltar mdor na dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyis lhag pa'i brgya phrag gcig go / khams 'phyang ba po yang de bzhin no //

original: de'i phyir dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi rnams la so so re rer 'phyang ba po 'di rnams thams cad kyi ming gi grangs kyang 'di rnams kyis bshad do//

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sum cu rtsa drug rnams thams cad sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bdag nyid can te /

analyzed: gang gi tshe mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa nas brtson 'grus chen mo'i bar dang khva gdong ma la sogs pas rnal 'byor ma sum cu rtsa drug rnams kyi le'u rnams su sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bdag nyid can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rnams bshad de

analyzed: de ltar mig dang bu ga zla ba'i grangs byas pa'o //

analyzed: de bzhin du 'khor los sgyur ba bcu gnyis kyis bco lnga par bshad pa rnams su 'gyur ro //

translated: However, the application of these is the explanation of the characteristics of all of the twenty-four heroes, beginning with KapƒÅla, in the presentation of the syllables of the names.üîΩThus, one should understand that those heroes, who are of the nature of the hanging (avadƒÅta) [syllables], are located within all of these channels, beginning with VƒÅrƒÅhƒ´.

analyzed: de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi sgra ni rlangs pa tsam gyi nang du thim pa ste /

analyzed: de bzhin khams thams cad gnyid log pa'i gdong la bsnun pas bde ba'i gzugs langs par bya'o //
translated: face of the sleep of all the elements.üîΩWhat is the explanation of that? Here, the form of awakening, theüîΩinconceivable gnosis at the peak of the descent of all the elements, is

analyzed: de ltar bshad pa cir 'gyur 'dir khams thams cad shin tu 'bab pa'i rtse mor bsam du med pa'i ye shes byang chub kyi gzugs su rnam par gnas so zhes bya bar bshad par 'gyur ro ;
translated: explained as abiding.

original: / de nyid kyi dpe gsungs pa /
analyzed: / de nyid kyi dpe gsungs pa /
translated: The example of that is stated:

analyzed: dpa' bo'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /

original: gang dang 'dra ba ni g-yul ngo'i dus su sngon du ral gri'i rig pa la sogs pa'i 'thab pa'i skyes bu dpa' zhing stobs che la stobs la brtson pa pha rol gnon pa rnams kyi lag par son pa'i ral gri me @265a * //

translated: What is it like? It is like a sword that is in the hands of heroes who are strong and powerful, who are skilled in the arts of war, who are valiant and strive to overcome others, when they are in battle.

analyzed: tog bzhin 'bigs pa'am mi 'bigs so // de dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni de de bzhin du bshad par 'gyur te /

analyzed: de ltar ci'i gzugs kyis 'phyang ba'i ral gris 'bigs pa gsungs pa /

analyzed: thams cad du 'bab pas rtse'i mtshams thams cad du yongs su gnas so //

analyzed: de ltar gzhom du med par bshad pa'i dpa' bo zhes bya ba la sogs pas ba'i yi ge'i don gyis te /

analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis de de bzhin du bshad par 'gyur ro //

translated: Again, the meaning of the syllable ‚Äúga‚Äù is explained by ‚Äúemergence,‚Äù etc.

analyzed: sems can gyi don du slar yang 'ong ba ste ye shes kyi khams kyi rang bzhin pas so //

analyzed: de'i phyir 'phyang bzhin pa 'gro bar 'dod pa nyid de /

analyzed: thams cad gzhom du med pa'i gzugs su 'du shes par bya'o // 'on kyang / rang dang gzhan du rig pa spangs //

original: zhes bya ba'i rgyus shes par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i rgyus shes par bya'o //
translated: However, this should be understood by the reason stated in the verse, ‚ÄúAbandoning the discrimination of self and other.‚Äù

original: da ni 'di'i sbyor bas rdzogs pa na slar yang ku lu ta'i yi ge rnams su gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas bcud len gyi dngos grub kyi 'bras bu rgyas par gsungs pa /

translated: Now, when this is completed by the application, again, by the application of nonduality in the syllables of Kuluta, the fruit of the elixir of life is declared in detail.

original: rigs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rigs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The family and so forth.

original: ku'i yi ge'i don gyis rigs dang rigs can gyi khams gnyis rang gis rig pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang gnyis kun du sbyor ba can /

translated: When there is the time of supreme non-emission, those two constituents are in the middle of the spread, that is, in the middle of the spread of all of these, in the middle of the vajra of the avadh≈´tƒ´, they enter.

original: 'dis gnyis pa de rnams spangs par byas so //
analyzed: 'dis gnyis pa de rnams spangs par byas so //
translated: By this, the second is abandoned.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na khams thams cad zhu bas nam mkha' bzhin du gnas so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so //
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na khams thams cad zhu bas nam mkha' bzhin du gnas so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so //

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: That is taught:

translated: The two constituents enter into the middle of the avadh≈´tƒ´, ‚Äúinto the inner space,‚Äù that is, into the ultimate and relative bodhicitta. All constituents are within that. That is explained in that way.

analyzed: de'i phyir skye 'gro kun gyi rgyas pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi lus la bsgrub par 'gyur ro // des rang bzhin gyi ste drug pa'i don gyis gnyis pa ste /
translated: By that, ‚Äúthe growth of all beings‚Äù is accomplished in one‚Äôs body.

original: de rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /

original: ha'i yi ge'i don gyis te ye shes kyi dbus su ye shes kyi rnam par skye 'gro rnams su skyes pa na /
analyzed: ha'i yi ge'i don gyis te ye shes kyi dbus su ye shes kyi rnam par skye 'gro rnams su skyes pa na /
translated: By the meaning of the letter ha, in the middle of gnosis, when beings are born in the form of gnosis,

original: sems can gyi don byas nas sa gsum du gnas pa med do //
analyzed: sems can gyi don byas nas sa gsum du gnas pa med do //
translated: having acted for the welfare of sentient beings, they do not abide in the three worlds.

original: sngon gyi dus su mkha' spyod du nye bar bzhud pa thob par byas nas de rnams phyis yang de la goms pa'i bag chags kyis so //
analyzed: sngon gyi dus su mkha' spyod du nye bar bzhud pa thob par byas nas de rnams phyis yang de la goms pa'i bag chags kyis so //
translated: Having previously attained the state of moving in space, later they again become habituated to that through imprints.

original: gang gi phyir sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbus su zhes bya ba ni dbu mar gnas pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbus su zhes bya ba ni dbu mar gnas pa ste /

original: zag med ces bya ba ni mchog tu zag pa med pa'i ye shes kyis te nges pa'o //
analyzed: zag med ces bya ba ni mchog tu zag pa med pa'i ye shes kyis te nges pa'o //
translated: uncontaminated means ascertained by supreme, uncontaminated gnosis.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
translated: As such and so forth.

original: yang dag gi go 'phang gnas zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos so //
analyzed: yang dag gi go 'phang gnas zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos so //
translated: The state of reality is the factors of enlightenment.

original: de'i phyir de'i go 'phang gis gnas pas brjod ba med pa ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i go 'phang gis gnas pas brjod ba med pa ste /
translated: Therefore, since one abides in that state, it is inexpressible.

original: 'di ni dgongs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni dgongs pa ste /
translated: This is the intention,

original: don dam pas man dag thams cad brjod pa'o //
analyzed: don dam pas man dag thams cad brjod pa'o //
translated: the meaning of which is that all mantras are expressed by the ultimate.

original: de'i phyir sngags chen po zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir sngags chen po zhes bya ste /
translated: Therefore, it is called the great mantra.

original: mchog tu zag pa med pa de'i bdag nyid sbas pa'i don gyis sngags ni mchog nyid de chen po'o //
analyzed: mchog tu zag pa med pa de'i bdag nyid sbas pa'i don gyis sngags ni mchog nyid de chen po'o //
translated: The mantra, which is the nature of that supreme, uncontaminated [state], is the supreme, the great, by the hidden meaning.

original: de ltar gzhom du med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa khyad par du byed pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar gzhom du med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa khyad par du byed pa'o //
translated: Thus, it is the invincible and so on, which are the distinguishing features.

original: da ni sngags khams thams cad kyi sngon du bshad pa rnams kyi dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi rnams su 'phyang ba can gyi dpa' bo rnams nyid kyi tshad kyi mtshan nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni sngags khams thams cad kyi sngon du bshad pa rnams kyi dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi rnams su 'phyang ba can gyi dpa' bo rnams nyid kyi tshad kyi mtshan nyid gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the characteristics of the measure of the heroes who hang from the twenty-four heroes who were previously explained in all the elements of the mantra are stated:

original: khams rnams kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: khams rnams kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /

original: @266a * // 'chad par 'gyur ba'i khams rnams kyi dngos po skra dang / spu la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: @266a * // 'chad par 'gyur ba'i khams rnams kyi dngos po skra dang / spu la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The entities of the elements that will be explained are hair, body hair, and so on.

original: de ltar thod pa'i dum bu zhes bya ba ni gcig gi ming bzung bas 'di rnams thams cad kyi ming bzung bsnye dus la sogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar thod pa'i dum bu zhes bya ba ni gcig gi ming bzung bas 'di rnams thams cad kyi ming bzung bsnye dus la sogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the name of one, ‚ÄúK·πõ·π£·πáa,‚Äù is taken, and all of these are taken, such as ‚Äútime.‚Äù

original: de yang ming rnams kyi dpa' bo rnams su yongs su gnas pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de yang ming rnams kyi dpa' bo rnams su yongs su gnas pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: And that is the abode of the heroes of the names.

original: mang po'i tshig gis 'di'i nges pa de ltar 'dir sen mo dang so 'bab pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mang po'i tshig gis 'di'i nges pa de ltar 'dir sen mo dang so 'bab pa zhes bya'o //
translated: By the word ‚Äúmany,‚Äù the certainty of this is stated here, as ‚Äúfalling nails and teeth.‚Äù

original: de ltar dang po'i khams re re zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du bshad do //
analyzed: de ltar dang po'i khams re re zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du bshad do //
translated: Thus, ‚Äúeach of the elements in the beginning‚Äù is explained in the same way.

original: sa la sogs pa'i khams bzhi zhes bya ba ni sa dung chu dang de bzhin du me dang rlung ngo //
analyzed: sa la sogs pa'i khams bzhi zhes bya ba ni sa dung chu dang de bzhin du me dang rlung ngo //
translated: The four elements of earth, etc., are earth, conch, water, and likewise fire and wind.

original: rdzas bzhi rnams zhes bya ba ni sems dang / sems pa dang bsam bya dang sems pa po ste bzhi'o //
analyzed: rdzas bzhi rnams zhes bya ba ni sems dang / sems pa dang bsam bya dang sems pa po ste bzhi'o //
translated: The four substances are mind, volition, the object of volition, and the agent of volition.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni khams rnams pa brgyad rnams gnas gsum du sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni khams rnams pa brgyad rnams gnas gsum du sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Thus, the eight elements are to be applied to the three abodes.

original: de la 'phyang ba skra dang ba sbu zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas sna bas dang rkang mar 'bab pa zhes bya ba'i bar du rim pa ji lta bas de rnams su sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de la 'phyang ba skra dang ba sbu zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas sna bas dang rkang mar 'bab pa zhes bya ba'i bar du rim pa ji lta bas de rnams su sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: In this regard, hanging down, hair, and body hair, and so forth, up to flowing from the nose and feet, should be applied in order to those [places].

original: dpa' bo thams cad ces bya ba ni dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi rnams kyis bya'o //
analyzed: dpa' bo thams cad ces bya ba ni dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi rnams kyis bya'o //
translated: All heroes means [it should be done] by the twenty-four heroes.

original: slar yang de ltar dum bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas mchog gi bde bar brjod ces bya ba'i bar du dpa' bo rnams kyis rang gi ming rnams kyi nges pa'i tshig bstan to //
analyzed: slar yang de ltar dum bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas mchog gi bde bar brjod ces bya ba'i bar du dpa' bo rnams kyis rang gi ming rnams kyi nges pa'i tshig bstan to //
translated: Again, in that way, parts, and so forth, up to supreme bliss, the heroes have explained the etymologies of their own names.

original: des de ltar rab tu gtum mo la sogs pa'i le'u rnams su ji srid 'di'i bar du dpa' bo dang gnyis su med pa'i dgos pa dang byed pa go bar bya'o //
analyzed: des de ltar rab tu gtum mo la sogs pa'i le'u rnams su ji srid 'di'i bar du dpa' bo dang gnyis su med pa'i dgos pa dang byed pa go bar bya'o //
translated: Thus, in the chapters beginning with Very Fierce, up to this point, the purpose and function of the non-dual hero should be understood.

original: de'i tshe de rnams kyi thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa phyed dang bcas pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum rnams kyis dpa' bo thams cad kyi khams dang rtsa rnams kyis skad cig skad cig la mngon sum du ro myang ba'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de'i tshe de rnams kyi thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa phyed dang bcas pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum rnams kyis dpa' bo thams cad kyi khams dang rtsa rnams kyis skad cig skad cig la mngon sum du ro myang ba'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: At that time, the three and a half verses beginning with ‚Äúall‚Äù describe the nature of the experience of all heroes, moment by moment, through the elements and channels.

original: de bzhin du khams rnams kyi tha mal pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste ;
analyzed: de bzhin du khams rnams kyi tha mal pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste ;
translated: Similarly, the elements are free from ordinary nature.

original: de rnams kyi yang rang bzhin rnams kyi tshad ni dus tshod dang klu dang mda' zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi yang rang bzhin rnams kyi tshad ni dus tshod dang klu dang mda' zhes bya ste /
translated: Their natures are measured in terms of time, nƒÅgas, and arrows.

original: bdun cu rtsa drug gi lhag pa'i lnga brgya rnams so //
analyzed: bdun cu rtsa drug gi lhag pa'i lnga brgya rnams so //
translated: There are five hundred and seventy-six.

original: de bzhin du dper bya ba lhan cig skye ba bshad pas so //
analyzed: de bzhin du dper bya ba lhan cig skye ba bshad pas so //
translated: Similarly, the example of connate joy is explained.

original: de bzhin du gser 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad @266b pa gcig gis 'di'i dpe bstan pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du gser 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad @266b pa gcig gis 'di'i dpe bstan pa ste /
translated: Similarly, the one verse beginning with ‚Äúalchemy‚Äù teaches the example of this.

original: gzhan rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: gzhan rtogs par sla'o //
translated: The others are easy to understand.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis khams thams cad la zhugs pas brtson 'grus chen pos rgyas btab par bstan te /
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis khams thams cad la zhugs pas brtson 'grus chen pos rgyas btab par bstan te /
translated: Therefore, etc.

original: des de ltar kun nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyis dngos po thams cad gcig pa mthong ba na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du bstan to //
analyzed: des de ltar kun nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyis dngos po thams cad gcig pa mthong ba na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du bstan to //
translated: By seeing all things as one, one is a Tathagata, as shown by the second half of the verse: Thus, all things, etc.

original: de bzhin du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos po blta pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos po blta pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Likewise, in order to show the supramundane thing, it is said:

original: mkha' 'gro zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The dakinis, etc.

original: de ltar rgyud lnga rnams kyi dngos po gang gi de'i las rab tu ston pa po zhes bya ba ni las kyi tshogs thams cad ston pa po sangs rgyas nyid ston pa bo nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar rgyud lnga rnams kyi dngos po gang gi de'i las rab tu ston pa po zhes bya ba ni las kyi tshogs thams cad ston pa po sangs rgyas nyid ston pa bo nyid do //
translated: Thus, the one who shows all the collections of actions is the teacher of Buddhahood itself, as shown by the verse: Thus, the thing of the five tantras, etc.

original: des 'di zhes bya ba ni mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho la sogs pa'i rgyud chen por yang bla na med pa'i ye shes ston pa po thub pa skyes mchog gis gsungs te /
analyzed: des 'di zhes bya ba ni mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho la sogs pa'i rgyud chen por yang bla na med pa'i ye shes ston pa po thub pa skyes mchog gis gsungs te /
translated: That means that the supreme sage, the teacher of unsurpassed pristine consciousness, has spoken in the great tantras such as the Ocean of Dakas, etc.

original: rnal 'byor chen po gtso bo nyid pas so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po gtso bo nyid pas so //
translated: Because he is the principal great yoga.

original: rgyud lnga rnams kyi yan lag rnams rgyud 'di yongs su shes par byed pa'i gzugs te /
analyzed: rgyud lnga rnams kyi yan lag rnams rgyud 'di yongs su shes par byed pa'i gzugs te /
translated: The limbs of the five tantras are the form that causes this tantra to be known.

original: ji ltar sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga rnams kyis yongs su shes par byed pa ni drug pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga rnams kyis yongs su shes par byed pa ni drug pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: Just as the five perfections of generosity, discipline, patience, diligence, and concentration cause it to be known, the sixth perfection is the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'on kyang rgyud lnga po rnams kyi rnal 'byor chen po la sogs pa'i de kho na nyid du yang rnams par gnas so //
analyzed: 'on kyang rgyud lnga po rnams kyi rnal 'byor chen po la sogs pa'i de kho na nyid du yang rnams par gnas so //
translated: However, the reality of the great yoga, etc., of the five tantras also abides there.

original: gang de yang der drang zhes bya ba ni mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho nas las chen po drang ba'o //
analyzed: gang de yang der drang zhes bya ba ni mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho nas las chen po drang ba'o //
translated: And that is also drawn there means that the great action is drawn from the Ocean of Dakas.

original: de yang 'dir dum bu bur zhes bya ba ni ji srid thog ma nas brtsams nas mtha'i bar du le'u rnams su de rnams kyi gnas su der gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de yang 'dir dum bu bur zhes bya ba ni ji srid thog ma nas brtsams nas mtha'i bar du le'u rnams su de rnams kyi gnas su der gnas pa'o //
translated: Here, divided into parts means that, beginning from the beginning up to the end, they are located there in the chapters.

original: de'i phyir phra mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa phyed dang bcas pa'i tshigs su bcad pas rgyud thams cad kyis nges pa phra mo chen po'i bya ba'i chogs te rlung dang rnam par shes par mngon par brjod pas so //
analyzed: de'i phyir phra mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa phyed dang bcas pa'i tshigs su bcad pas rgyud thams cad kyis nges pa phra mo chen po'i bya ba'i chogs te rlung dang rnam par shes par mngon par brjod pas so //
translated: Therefore, subtle and so on is a half-verse. The collection of great subtle activities of all the tantras is expressed by wind and consciousness.

original: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa /
translated: It is also said:

original: rlung ni phra mo'i gzugs kyis ni //
analyzed: rlung ni phra mo'i gzugs kyis ni //
translated: The wind in subtle form

original: ye shes dang ni 'dres par son //
analyzed: ye shes dang ni 'dres par son //
translated: Enters into the wisdom.

original: de yi sbyor ba 'di kun gyi //üîΩkhams rnams kyi ni thim la sogs //
analyzed: de yi sbyor ba 'di kun gyi // khams rnams kyi ni thim la sogs //
translated: By that yoga, all of this

original: zhes pas so //
analyzed: zhes pas so //
translated: Dissolves into the elements and so on.

original: de ltar khams rnams kyi grong rnams su zhes bya ba ni khams @267a * //
analyzed: de ltar khams rnams kyi grong rnams su zhes bya ba ni khams @267a * //
translated: Thus, in the cities of the elements,

original: so so rnams kyi gnas su ye shes blang ba ste /
analyzed: so so rnams kyi gnas su ye shes blang ba ste /
translated: in the abodes of each element, wisdom is taken up.

original: ji ltar khams thams cad bems po'i khams rnams kyi skabs las khams chen po rang bzhin dang mnyam pa yongs su blangs nas des de rnams su las rnams bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar khams thams cad bems po'i khams rnams kyi skabs las khams chen po rang bzhin dang mnyam pa yongs su blangs nas des de rnams su las rnams bya'o //
translated: Just as in the context of the elements of matter, having taken up the great element of the nature of space, one should perform actions with those.

original: ji lta ba'i rim pas yi shes blangs nas sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin du mtshon par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ji lta ba'i rim pas yi shes blangs nas sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin du mtshon par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: In the same way, having taken up the consciousness, one should indicate it as the nature of the Buddha. This is the meaning.

original: de ltar rgyud thams cad du thog mar zhes bya ba la sogs pas des de bzhin du bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar rgyud thams cad du thog mar zhes bya ba la sogs pas des de bzhin du bshad pa'o //
translated: Thus, in all the tantras, first, etc. explains that in the same way.

original: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa rtogs par sla'o //
translated: Yoga, etc. is easy to understand.

original: da ni nang gi bdag nyid chen po'i bcud len gyi rdzas rnams gsungs pa bcud len zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: da ni nang gi bdag nyid chen po'i bcud len gyi rdzas rnams gsungs pa bcud len zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Now, the substances of the great inner elixir are stated: elixir, etc.

original: sman chen po zhes bya ba ni don chen po yongs su rig pa'i sman chen po ste /
analyzed: sman chen po zhes bya ba ni don chen po yongs su rig pa'i sman chen po ste /
translated: Great medicine is the great medicine of the knowledge of great meaning.

original: nyi shu rtsa bzhi zhes bya ba ni mtshams sbyor gyi skad kyi nang du dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i rang bzhin rnams so //
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa bzhi zhes bya ba ni mtshams sbyor gyi skad kyi nang du dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i rang bzhin rnams so //
translated: The twenty-four are the natures of the twenty-four heroes in the language of the connecting [mantras].

original: de ltar sman 'di rnams kyi mdor bstan pa'i tshig rnams gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar sman 'di rnams kyi mdor bstan pa'i tshig rnams gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, having stated the words of the brief explanation of these herbs,

original: gsang bzhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gsang bzhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: he says ‚Äúsecret‚Äù and so forth.

original: 'di rnams 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rgyas par bshad pa'i tshig rnams kyi rdzas bcu drug rnams su bshad do //
analyzed: 'di rnams 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rgyas par bshad pa'i tshig rnams kyi rdzas bcu drug rnams su bshad do //
translated: These are explained as the sixteen substances of the words of the extensive explanation that will be explained.

original: de ltar brgyad kyi phyed du zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ltar brgyad kyi phyed du zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Thus, ‚Äúhalf of eight‚Äù

original: rdzas brgyad rnams te tsa'i yi ges brgyad kyi phyed de'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi'i 'chang par 'gyur ba rnams kyis te /
analyzed: rdzas brgyad rnams te tsa'i yi ges brgyad kyi phyed de'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi'i 'chang par 'gyur ba rnams kyis te /
translated: is the eight substances. The letter ca is half of eight. The four verses that will be heldüîΩare stated.

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: He says:

original: sgra las 'byung zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas bcu drug cha rin po che zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
analyzed: sgra las 'byung zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas bcu drug cha rin po che zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
translated: ‚Äúarising from sound‚Äù and so forth up to ‚Äúthe sixteen parts are jewels.‚Äù

original: de ltar thams cad rnams su gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas so //
analyzed: de ltar thams cad rnams su gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas so //

analyzed: de'i phyir ye shes snying po zhes bya ste ye shes kyi rang bzhin rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi rang bzhin rnams kyi snying po ni thugs te /
translated: Therefore, you are called the essence of wisdom. The essence of those whose nature is wisdom, the essence of those whose nature is the enlightenment of the Buddhas, is the mind.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to you, Vajrasattva!

original: gnyis pa bdag cag lag na rdo rje la sogs pa rnams brjod do //
analyzed: gnyis pa bdag cag lag na rdo rje la sogs pa rnams brjod do //
translated: The second [verse] is stated for us, VajrapƒÅ·πái and so forth.

original: 'dis ma bshad kyang stong pa nyid bshad pa yang ngo //
analyzed: 'dis ma bshad kyang stong pa nyid bshad pa yang ngo //
translated: Although this is not explained, it is also the explanation of emptiness.

original: slar yang thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pas snying rje gsungs pa /
analyzed: slar yang thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pas snying rje gsungs pa /
translated: Again, with compassion for all... and so forth, compassion is stated.

original: sems can gang rnams kyi rang gi sems bskyed pa'i tshig gi don thams cad la chos la dmigs pa'i snying @269a * //
analyzed: sems can gang rnams kyi rang gi sems bskyed pa'i tshig gi don thams cad la chos la dmigs pa'i snying @269a * //
translated: You, who are the essence of the innate taste, are the condition of form for those sentient beings whose minds are generated by the meaning of the words, since you are compassion that takes the Dharma as its object.

original: rjer 'gyur bas lhan cig skyes pa'i ro'i bdag nyid can de khyod kyis gzugs kyi rkyen te de'i gzugs su ste /
analyzed: rjer 'gyur bas lhan cig skyes pa'i ro'i bdag nyid can de khyod kyis gzugs kyi rkyen te de'i gzugs su ste /
translated: In that form, you are the condition of form for those sentient beings, and in that form, you are the condition of form for yourself.

original: de slar sems can dang rang gi bdag nyid la smod pa po rnams 'dis rang gi bdag nyid du 'dzin pa la sogs pa spangs pas zhes bya bar dgongs so ;
analyzed: de slar sems can dang rang gi bdag nyid la smod pa po rnams 'dis rang gi bdag nyid du 'dzin pa la sogs pa spangs pas zhes bya bar dgongs so ;
translated: The thought is that by this, those who disparage sentient beings and themselves abandon the grasping of themselves, and so on.

original: / de'i phyir de'i yon tan kyang brjod do //
analyzed: / de'i phyir de'i yon tan kyang brjod do //
translated: Therefore, his qualities are also described.

original: slar yang gnyis su med pa bshad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: slar yang gnyis su med pa bshad pa'i phyir /
translated: Again, in order to explain nonduality, he says:

original: bdag gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: bdag gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúMy‚Äù and so on.

original: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dus thams cad du gnyis su med pa stong pa nyid dang snying rjer son pas nye bar spyod pas so //
analyzed: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dus thams cad du gnyis su med pa stong pa nyid dang snying rjer son pas nye bar spyod pas so //
translated: When all buddhas at all times attain nonduality, emptiness and compassion, they enjoy themselves with that.

original: de'i tshe thams cad la khro ba nyid du nye bar gshegs pas rang bzhin yongs su zhes pa'i snying rje chen pos nye bar bsags nas thams cad du bya ba byed pa'i snying rje chen po'i don gyis khyod kyi bdag cag la yang gang zhu ba phul ba'i
analyzed: de'i tshe thams cad la khro ba nyid du nye bar gshegs pas rang bzhin yongs su zhes pa'i snying rje chen pos nye bar bsags nas thams cad du bya ba byed pa'i snying rje chen po'i don gyis khyod kyi bdag cag la yang gang zhu ba phul ba'i
translated: At that time, since you approached all with wrath, you accumulated great compassion through the great compassion of the totally pure nature.üîΩ

original: bka' drin chen po mdzad par rigs pa'o //
analyzed: bka' drin chen po mdzad par rigs pa'o //
translated: At that time, having approached all with wrath itself, having accumulated with great compassion that is completely natural, with the meaning of great compassion that acts everywhere, it is fitting that you also do a great favor for us who have offered a request.

original: de bshad pa ;
analyzed: de bshad pa ;
translated: That is explained:

original: 'dri'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'dri'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Ask, and so on.

original: khyod rdo rje phag mo bdag gi rgyu mtshan gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba chen po'i bde ba la yongs su zhugs pa'i bdag po la 'dri'o zhes bya bar 'brel to //
analyzed: khyod rdo rje phag mo bdag gi rgyu mtshan gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba chen po'i bde ba la yongs su zhugs pa'i bdag po la 'dri'o zhes bya bar 'brel to //
translated: You, Vajravarahi, ask the Lord who is completely absorbed in the bliss of great bliss on my behalf.

original: ci la sogs pa dri ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci la sogs pa dri ba gsungs pa /
translated: What, and so on, is asked:

original: mi shes zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: mi shes zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Ignorant, and so on.

original: rgyud thams cad du zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud 'dus pa bde mchog la sogs par 'ong ngo //
analyzed: rgyud thams cad du zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud 'dus pa bde mchog la sogs par 'ong ngo //
translated: In all tantras means in the Yoga and Yogini tantras, the Guhyasamaja, Heruka, and so on.

original: yang rnal 'byor la sogs pa'i rgyud lngar te der las kyi tshogs kyi bsgrub pa rnams bdag gis mi shes so zhes bya ba ni dri ba gcig go //
analyzed: yang rnal 'byor la sogs pa'i rgyud lngar te der las kyi tshogs kyi bsgrub pa rnams bdag gis mi shes so zhes bya ba ni dri ba gcig go //
translated: Again, in the five tantras beginning with Yoga, I do not know the accomplishments of the aggregate of rites is one question.

original: de bzhin du gnyis bzhi gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du gnyis bzhi gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Similarly, two, four, if... and so on.

original: de ltar 'di rnams kyi lan gyi tshig rnams gsungs pa /üîΩkye kye zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar 'di rnams kyi lan gyi tshig rnams gsungs pa / kye kye zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Thus, he states the answers to these:

original: brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa po zhes bya ba'i bar du bgrod sla'o //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa po zhes bya ba'i bar du bgrod sla'o //
translated: Oh! Oh! and so on, up to the expressible and the expresser.

original: de'i phyir las kyi tshogs thams cad zhi ba la sogs pa thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa de de bzhin du bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir las kyi tshogs thams cad zhi ba la sogs pa thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa de de bzhin du bshad pa'o //
translated: Therefore, all the aggregates of rites, such as pacification, and so on, are explained by KapƒÅla≈õakala and so on.

original: da ni le'u 'dar thag ma nyid du thod pa'i dum bu'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni le'u 'dar thag ma nyid du thod pa'i dum bu'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, in the very last chapter, he teaches the union with KapƒÅla≈õakala:

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: There, and so on.

original: de la'i sgra ni rang gi tshig gi dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de la'i sgra ni rang gi tshig gi dgongs pa'o //
translated: The word there is the intention of his own words.

original: de ltar ma lus pa rnam par shes pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni khams gsum @269b snod dang sems can gyi 'jig rten du thod pa'i dum bur 'chad par 'gyur ba dang ldan pa rnams kyis dran par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar ma lus pa rnam par shes pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni khams gsum @269b snod dang sems can gyi 'jig rten du thod pa'i dum bur 'chad par 'gyur ba dang ldan pa rnams kyis dran par bya'o //
translated: Thus, the so-called phenomena of consciousness should be remembered by those who possess the skull-cup, which is explained as the world of the environment and beings of the three realms.

original: 'dis kyang sems can thams cad du shes par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dis kyang sems can thams cad du shes par bya ste /
translated: By this, all sentient beings should be understood.

original: las dang nyon mongs pa bde ba //
analyzed: las dang nyon mongs pa bde ba //
translated: Karma and afflictions are happiness.

original: zhes bya ba ni sngon gyi las kyi dbang gis sems can rnams kyi rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi rigs dang lha dang srin po dang mi la sogs pa tshogs su rab tu skyes pa las skyes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngon gyi las kyi dbang gis sems can rnams kyi rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi rigs dang lha dang srin po dang mi la sogs pa tshogs su rab tu skyes pa las skyes pa'o //
translated: This is born from the birth of the twenty-seven constellations of sentient beings, gods, rƒÅk·π£asas, humans, and so on, due to the power of previous karma.

original: de bzhin du sngon gyi las kyis de ltar ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du sngon gyi las kyis de ltar ro //
translated: Similarly, it is so due to previous karma.

original: ra si bcu gnyis rnams kyis rgyu skar la sogs pa dang gza'i longs spyod bcu la sogs pa bde ba dang sdug bsngal dag las nyon mongs pa skye'o //
analyzed: ra si bcu gnyis rnams kyis rgyu skar la sogs pa dang gza'i longs spyod bcu la sogs pa bde ba dang sdug bsngal dag las nyon mongs pa skye'o //
translated: The twelve houses give rise to the afflictions of happiness and suffering, such as the constellations and the ten enjoyments of the planets.

original: de bzhin du slar sngon gyi las kyis mngon sum du bde ba chen po la sogs pa ston pas bde ba nyid du shes so //üîΩgzhan du rgyud thams cad ces bya ba ni mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho la sogs pa sna tshogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyis nges pa'i las la sogs pa dang ldan pas gsum dang ma bral ba'i rigs pa yang zag pa med pa nyid kyis sku chen po la
analyzed: de bzhin du slar sngon gyi las kyis mngon sum du bde ba chen po la sogs pa ston pas bde ba nyid du shes so // gzhan du rgyud thams cad ces bya ba ni mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho la sogs pa sna tshogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyis nges pa'i las la sogs pa dang ldan pas gsum dang ma bral ba'i rigs pa yang zag pa med pa nyid kyis sku chen po la
translated: Likewise, again, by the power of former karma, the great bliss, etc. are manifested, and so it is known as bliss.

original: sogs pa mchog tu zag pa med pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sogs pa mchog tu zag pa med pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, all the tantras, i.e. the various yoginƒ´ tantras such as the ·∏åƒÅka-samudra, etc., would not have the nature of the supreme, uncontaminated intuition, i.e. the great body, etc., by the power of the uncontaminated, because they are endowed with the three, i.e. the contaminated karma, etc.

original: de thams cad gcig pas khyad par ji ltar yod ce na /
analyzed: de thams cad gcig pas khyad par ji ltar yod ce na /
translated: How can there be a difference, since all of them are one?

original: ye shes dang shes bya'i dngos pos zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes dang shes bya'i dngos pos zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
translated: The reply is: by the entity of intuition and the object of intuition.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba la bsams nas ye shes kyis nges par ltar bar byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba la bsams nas ye shes kyis nges par ltar bar byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, thinking of that, it is said that one should view it as ascertained by intuition.

original: shes bya de rnams gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: shes bya de rnams gsungs pa'o //
translated: Those objects of intuition are stated.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste de ltar mdor na lo bcu gcig gi bar du drug dang dgu ste rtsa'i yi ges dus gsum mo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste de ltar mdor na lo bcu gcig gi bar du drug dang dgu ste rtsa'i yi ges dus gsum mo //
translated: Thus, in brief, for eleven years, there are six and nine, that is, the channels and syllables of the three times.

original: de ltar yang zla ba bcu gnyis la zla phyed nyi shu rtsa bzhi drug cus lhag pa'i brgya phrag gsum gyi nyi ma'o //
analyzed: de ltar yang zla ba bcu gnyis la zla phyed nyi shu rtsa bzhi drug cus lhag pa'i brgya phrag gsum gyi nyi ma'o //
translated: In that way, there are twelve months, twenty-four half months, and three hundred days with sixty more.

original: de la sogs pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lon gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis so sor snang ste /
analyzed: de la sogs pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lon gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis so sor snang ste /
translated: In that way, the wheel of samsara is turned by sentient beings who abide in that way.

original: snang ba mi bden pa ni rmi lam lta bu mchog go //
analyzed: snang ba mi bden pa ni rmi lam lta bu mchog go //
translated: The supreme appearance that is not true is like a dream.

original: 'di lta bu 'gro bas ma shes pa rnams mi shes pa'i dri mas ma gos pa rnams kyis bde ba de rnams su ye shes kyi snang ba mi shes so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'di lta bu 'gro bas ma shes pa rnams mi shes pa'i dri mas ma gos pa rnams kyis bde ba de rnams su ye shes kyi snang ba mi shes so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the statement ‚Äúsentient beings do not know that‚Äù is that those who are not covered by the stain of ignorance do not know the appearance of pristine consciousness in those who do not know that.

original: gang gis shes /
analyzed: gang gis shes /
translated: Who knows that?

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: That itself is stated:

original: rnams shes zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rnams shes zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThe one who knows the stages of the ha·πÉsa‚Äù and so on.

original: ha ra do la'i rim pa zhes bya ba ni dbugs kyis gcig tu byed pa ste /
analyzed: ha ra do la'i rim pa zhes bya ba ni dbugs kyis gcig tu byed pa ste /
translated: The ‚Äústages of the ha·πÉsa‚Äù are the unification of the breath.

original: khri zhes bya ba la sogs @270a * //
analyzed: khri zhes bya ba la sogs @270a * //
translated: ‚ÄúTen thousand‚Äù and so on.

original: pas so // de de bzhin du bshad do //
analyzed: pas so // de de bzhin du bshad do //
translated: That is explained in the same way.

original: sa zhes bya ba ni dum bu bcu gnyis kyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: sa zhes bya ba ni dum bu bcu gnyis kyi bdag nyid do //
translated: The earth is the twelve parts.

original: gzhan thams cad go sla'o //
analyzed: gzhan thams cad go sla'o //
translated: All the rest is easy to understand.

original: nyi ma dgu zhes bya ba la sogs pas de ltar nyi ma dgu dang zla ba dgu dang lo dgu na'o //
analyzed: nyi ma dgu zhes bya ba la sogs pas de ltar nyi ma dgu dang zla ba dgu dang lo dgu na'o //
translated: Nine days, etc. - in that way, in nine days, nine months, and nine years.

original: bzhi lnga bcu zhes bya ba ni nyi ma bzhi pa dang lnga pa dang bcu na'o //
analyzed: bzhi lnga bcu zhes bya ba ni nyi ma bzhi pa dang lnga pa dang bcu na'o //
translated: Four, five, ten - in the fourth, fifth, and tenth days.

original: de ltar zla ba bzhi dang lo dag kyang ngo //
analyzed: de ltar zla ba bzhi dang lo dag kyang ngo //
translated: In that way, in four months and years.

original: zla ba lnga dang lo dag kyang ngo //
analyzed: zla ba lnga dang lo dag kyang ngo //
translated: In five months and years.

original: zla bcu dang lo dag kyang ngo //
analyzed: zla bcu dang lo dag kyang ngo //
translated: In ten months and years.

original: bzhi drug ces bya ba ni nyi ma dang zla ba'o //
analyzed: bzhi drug ces bya ba ni nyi ma dang zla ba'o //
translated: Four, six - in the fourth and sixth days.

original: lnga gnyis bzhi brgya pa zhes bya ba ni rim pa ji lta bas nyi ma lnga dang zla ba gnyis dang bzhi dang brgyad pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: lnga gnyis bzhi brgya pa zhes bya ba ni rim pa ji lta bas nyi ma lnga dang zla ba gnyis dang bzhi dang brgyad pa'i bar du'o //
translated: Two, five, four, hundred - in the order, in two days, five days, four months, and up to eight hundred days.

original: gnyis lnga gsum zhes bya ba'i zla ba gnyis dang nyi ma lnga dang zla ba dang zla ba gsum dang lo dag na'o //
analyzed: gnyis lnga gsum zhes bya ba'i zla ba gnyis dang nyi ma lnga dang zla ba dang zla ba gsum dang lo dag na'o //
translated: Two, five, three - in two months, five days, and three months and years.

original: gnyis dang cu zhes bya ba ni nyi ma gnyis dang zla ba dang nyi ma bcu dang zla ba na'o //
analyzed: gnyis dang cu zhes bya ba ni nyi ma gnyis dang zla ba dang nyi ma bcu dang zla ba na'o //
translated: Two and ten is the day, the moon, the sun, ten months and years.

original: gnyis dang brgyad ces bya ba ni nyi ma dang zla ba yis so //
analyzed: gnyis dang brgyad ces bya ba ni nyi ma dang zla ba yis so //
translated: Two and eight is the day and the moon.

original: de ltar gnyis pa dang brgyad pa zhes bya ba ni sngon bzhin no //
analyzed: de ltar gnyis pa dang brgyad pa zhes bya ba ni sngon bzhin no //
translated: Thus, two and eight is as before.

original: lnga dgu bcu pa nyid ces bya ba ni nyi ma dang zla ba dang lo'i rim pa ji lta bas so //
analyzed: lnga dgu bcu pa nyid ces bya ba ni nyi ma dang zla ba dang lo'i rim pa ji lta bas so //
translated: Five, nine, and one hundred is as the order of the day, the moon, and the year.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas bshad pa'i nyi ma rnams su bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas bshad pa'i nyi ma rnams su bshad par bya'o //
translated: Thus, and so on, the days are to be explained.

original: ro hi ta la sogs pa nyi ma dgu la zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
analyzed: ro hi ta la sogs pa nyi ma dgu la zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
translated: In the nine days of Rohi·πáƒ´ and so on, and so on.

original: de ltar rnam par shes pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar rnam par shes pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: Thus, the characteristics of the dependent origination of consciousness and so on.

original: thams cad go sla'o //
analyzed: thams cad go sla'o //
translated: All are easy to understand.

original: da ni thod pa'i dum bu'i yi ge rnams kyis nad kyi gnas skabs kyi sbyor ba nye bar ston par byed pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni thod pa'i dum bu'i yi ge rnams kyis nad kyi gnas skabs kyi sbyor ba nye bar ston par byed pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, in order to teach the application of the state of illness by means of the syllables of the skull cup, it is said:

original: 'di rnams kyi shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of these and so forth.

original: 'di rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni ro hi ta la sogs pa'i nyi ma'i dan pa rnams kyis rang gis bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni ro hi ta la sogs pa'i nyi ma'i dan pa rnams kyis rang gis bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The these are the sun's rays of Rohitaka and so forth, which are to be contemplated by oneself.

original: de gsung pa /
analyzed: de gsung pa /
translated: He says that:

original: mkha' 'gro zhes bya ba la sogs pa se /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro zhes bya ba la sogs pa se /
translated: The dakinis and so forth.

original: kha'i yi ge'i don gyis so //
analyzed: kha'i yi ge'i don gyis so //
translated: The meaning of the syllable kha is that.

original: nam mkha' 'gro bgrod pa'i rtsa gang zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: nam mkha' 'gro bgrod pa'i rtsa gang zhes bya ba ni //
translated: The channel that travels through space is called the egg of the heart.

original: 'di'i don du gdan bzhi par yang gsungs te de nyid bshad pa /
analyzed: 'di'i don du gdan bzhi par yang gsungs te de nyid bshad pa /
translated: For this meaning, the Catu·∏•pƒ´·π≠ha also says:

original: chu shing me tog padma 'di //
analyzed: chu shing me tog padma 'di //
translated: This lotus of the plantain tree

original: snying gi sgo nga yi ni gdan //üîΩde yis ye shes mkha' 'gro'i rgyal //
analyzed: snying gi sgo nga yi ni gdan // de yis ye shes mkha' 'gro'i rgyal //
translated: is the seat of the egg of the heart.

original: steng gi dbye bas sgong skyes so //
analyzed: steng gi dbye bas sgong skyes so //
translated: By the division of the upper [part], it is the egg-born king of the wisdom dakinis.

original: zhes so // de ltar kha 'og tu bltas pa'i padma las 'gro ba'i rtsa gang dpral ba'i bar du nam mkha' la 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: zhes so // de ltar kha 'og tu bltas pa'i padma las 'gro ba'i rtsa gang dpral ba'i bar du nam mkha' la 'gro ba ste /
translated: Thus, the channel of beings that travels through space from the lotus that faces downward up to the forehead is in the sky.

original: dbugs @270b rnams su mi 'pho bas so //
analyzed: dbugs @270b rnams su mi 'pho bas so //
translated: Because the breaths do not move there.

original: de nyid mchog tu zag pa med pa'i gzugs srog chen po'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid mchog tu zag pa med pa'i gzugs srog chen po'i bdag nyid do //
translated: That itself is the supreme, uncontaminated form, the nature of the great life-force.

original: de yi dbus su bdag spyod bya //
analyzed: de yi dbus su bdag spyod bya //
translated: One should practice in the middle of that.

original: zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i bdag nyid can gyi ye shes dang rnam par zhes pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i bdag nyid can gyi ye shes dang rnam par zhes pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the syllable ka, which is the nature of the pristine consciousness that is the nature of the intrinsic light of the self.

original: de gnyis gsungs pa /

analyzed: mkha' 'gro chen po zhes bya ba ni 'od gsal ba'i gzugs kyi bdag nyid can te mkha' 'gro ma dang bcas zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúThe great ·∏çƒÅkinƒ´‚Äù is the one whose nature is the form of clear light. ‚ÄúAlong with the ·∏çƒÅkinƒ´s‚Äù is because of the intrinsic nature of the essential nature.

analyzed: da ni mdor bsdus pa'i yi ge lnga bcu rnams kyi aa'i yi ge la sogs pa'i rig pa ston pa'i gru gsum pa'i dbus su a'a li k'a li'i gzugs can gzhag ste / de bzhin du dbyangs bcu drug gi khams @279a * //

analyzed: kyi gzugs rnams su lus la stong pa nyid kyi rnam par gzhag par shes par bya'o //

original: de bzhin du dang po ka'i yi ge nas ma'i yi ge'i bar du de kho na nyid nyi shu rtsa lnga las kyi tshogs rnams dang dbyangs rnams kyis kyang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du dang po ka'i yi ge nas ma'i yi ge'i bar du de kho na nyid nyi shu rtsa lnga las kyi tshogs rnams dang dbyangs rnams kyis kyang ngo //

original: ya'i yi ge la sogs pa gsung rab yan lag dgu dbu ma'i chos kyi 'byung gnas su yi ge btub gsungs pa /
analyzed: ya'i yi ge la sogs pa gsung rab yan lag dgu dbu ma'i chos kyi 'byung gnas su yi ge btub gsungs pa /

analyzed: thams cad chos 'byung zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /

analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i gzugs can gyi lte bar gzhom du med pa h'um gi yi ge zhi ba dge ba ster ba po'o //

original: chos thams cad gcig tu sdud pa ni yi ge aom mo //
analyzed: chos thams cad gcig tu sdud pa ni yi ge aom mo //
translated: The letter o·πÉ is the condensation of all phenomena into one.

original: lhag ma de de bzhin no //
analyzed: lhag ma de de bzhin no //

original: dpa' bo zhes bya ba ni yi ge re re'o //
analyzed: dpa' bo zhes bya ba ni yi ge re re'o //

original: 'dod don thams cad sgrub pa po //
analyzed: 'dod don thams cad sgrub pa po //

analyzed: don gyi sgrub pa byed pa gsungs pa /

analyzed: der gnas pa la 'gro ba dang 'ong ba dag gi rtag tu bsngags pas sgrub pa po rnams kyi dngos grub ster ba'o // gang gis dngos grub ster ba gsungs pa //

analyzed: lnga bcu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /

analyzed: dbyangs dang gsal byed rnams kyi'o //

analyzed: sgra 'dis de ltar rgyud dang lung dang bstan bcos mang po rnams kyi brjod bya'o //

analyzed: 'dir aa'i yi ge la @279b sogs pa dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug rnams par 'gyur ba'i bsgom pa gsungs pa //

original: aa yi ge ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: aa yi ge ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /

original: de'i phyir rigs mtshan can no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rigs mtshan can no //

analyzed: de ltar a'a'i yi ge dang a'i'i yi ge khrag ste /

original: gang gi phyir bde ba rab tu 'bebs pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir bde ba rab tu 'bebs pa'o //

analyzed: au yig dbang po'i gzhu dang mnyam //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'dis lus 'jam pa'i rdo rjer bshad do //

analyzed: khams thams cad gsal ba stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the emptiness of the illumination of all constituents is

analyzed: a'u'i yi ge drug pa de bzhin zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs so //

analyzed: klog gnyis zhes bya ba ni me 'phro ba bzhin te gnyis zhes bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam ste /

analyzed: 'on kyang 'phro ba de dag 'dra bar chos thams cad bde ba'i gnas su spro bar bya'o zhes bya'o ;
translated: However, those emanations are similar, and all phenomena should be emanated into the abode of bliss.üîΩThe letter RE is the color of smoke,

analyzed: / re'i yi ge du ba'i mdog / ces bya ba ni sprin dang 'dra ba dri ma med pa'i nam mkha' las byung ngo //

analyzed: de nyid thim nas 'gro ba'o //

original: de nas phra mo lus spangs pa //
analyzed: de nas phra mo lus spangs pa //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni tshogs pa nyid dang gcig dang du ma'i nyid kyang ngo //

analyzed: lus rnams sangs rgyas rnams kyi gzugs //

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /

analyzed: sems kyi bag chags dang bral ba'o zhes bya bar dgongs pa'i don to //
translated: is the intended meaning.

original: re'i yi ge mun pa'i gzugs //
analyzed: re'i yi ge mun pa'i gzugs //
translated: The letter RE is the form of darkness,

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i gzugs can gyi sems 'od gsal ba'i rnam pa de yis bsam du med pa'i gzugs kyi stong pa nyid do //

original: li ni bya rog gshog pa 'dra /
analyzed: li ni bya rog gshog pa 'dra /

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni kha dog nag po chos kyi sku'i gzugs sems byang chub kyi sems kyi dbus su zhugs pa'o //

analyzed: de ltar li'i yi ge mtshal gyi mdog ni mngal du rang byung du lhan cig gcig pur byung ngo //

original: ae yig dmar zhing dkar ba zhes bya ba ni mngal las 'thon pa'i dus su gang byis pa'i sems gsal ba dang mi gsal ba'i stong pa @280a * //
analyzed: ae yig dmar zhing dkar ba zhes bya ba ni mngal las 'thon pa'i dus su gang byis pa'i sems gsal ba dang mi gsal ba'i stong pa @280a * //

original: nyid de de nyid de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: nyid de de nyid de skad ces bya'o //

original: aee sin dh'ur dmar po'i mdog /
analyzed: aee sin dh'ur dmar po'i mdog /

analyzed: ces bya ba ni 'dis rang nyid bla na med par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje dang bde ba mthong pa'o //

original: so'i yi ge nyi ma'i gzugs //
analyzed: so'i yi ge nyi ma'i gzugs //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje nyi ma'i gzugs dngos po ma lus pa dang ma rig pa la sogs pa za ba'o /

analyzed: stong phrag 'od zer 'bar zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi me can no //

original: aoo yi yi ge rgyun du 'bar //
analyzed: aoo yi yi ge rgyun du 'bar //

original: zhes bya ba ni dbang po thams cad bde ba la gnas pa'i nyi ma bye ba'i 'od dang mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dbang po thams cad bde ba la gnas pa'i nyi ma bye ba'i 'od dang mnyam pa'o //

original: 'dis lhan cig skyes pa'i mchog gi mtha' gsungs so //

original: mdor bsdus pas aom gyi yi ge'i gsungs pa /

analyzed: zla pa phye ba zhes bya ba ni bcu drug gi cha dpral ba'i dbus su yongs su gnas so //

original: thig le zhes bya ba ni lte ba'i dbus su ste de dag gi dbus su yi ge aa sngon du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can yi shes kyi snal ma zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: thig le zhes bya ba ni lte ba'i dbus su ste de dag gi dbus su yi ge aa sngon du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can yi shes kyi snal ma zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The drop is in the middle of the navel. In the middle of those two is the letter A, which has the characteristics explained above. The meaning of the word thread is knowledge.

original: de bzhin du zla ba gnyis ni ra'i yi ge gnyis te g-yon pa dang g-yas pa dag tu yang mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du zla ba gnyis ni ra'i yi ge gnyis te g-yon pa dang g-yas pa dag tu yang mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin no //

original: de'i phyir na tsheg drag go //
analyzed: de'i phyir na tsheg drag go //
translated: Therefore, it is the visarga.

original: mdor na aa: yi ge rgyal po ste de de bzhin du bshad do //
analyzed: mdor na aa: yi ge rgyal po ste de de bzhin du bshad do //

original: lhag ma ji lta ba bzhin no //
analyzed: lhag ma ji lta ba bzhin no //

original: da ni 'di rnams kyi las rnams kyi sngon du gsungs pa'i yi ge rnams kyis phyi nang gi bdag nyid kyi las rnams gsungs pa /

translated: Now, the actions of these are said to be the actions of the inner and outer natures by the syllables previously stated.

original: myos zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: myos zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Intoxicated, etc.

original: myos pa ni mchog tu bde bas so //
analyzed: myos pa ni mchog tu bde bas so //

original: 'chal ba ni rdo rje dang padma'i bar du 'gro ba spangs pa'o //
analyzed: 'chal ba ni rdo rje dang padma'i bar du 'gro ba spangs pa'o //

original: rmongs pa ni brjod pa dang rjod par byed pa po dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: rmongs pa ni brjod pa dang rjod par byed pa po dang bral ba'o //
translated: Confused is the absence of the expressed and the expresser.

original: sems dang bral ba ni rang dang gzhan du yongs su rig pa dang bral ba'o /
analyzed: sems dang bral ba ni rang dang gzhan du yongs su rig pa dang bral ba'o /

original: thog ma'i stong pa'o /
analyzed: thog ma'i stong pa'o /

original: zhes bya ba ni bcu drug rnams kyi thog ma'i aa'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bcu drug rnams kyi thog ma'i aa'i yi ge'o //

original: de lta zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa a'a'i yi ge'i gsungs pa /
analyzed: de lta zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa a'a'i yi ge'i gsungs pa /
translated: Thus is the second syllable A.üîΩDelusion, etc.

original: gti mug ces bya ba la sogs pa ste steng du 'gro bar 'gyur bas mi dor ba'o //
analyzed: gti mug ces bya ba la sogs pa ste steng du 'gro bar 'gyur bas mi dor ba'o //

original: bral bar gnas zhes bya ba ni dkar po'i phyogs kyi zla ba 'phel ba bzhin du ste nges pa'o //
analyzed: bral bar gnas zhes bya ba ni dkar po'i phyogs kyi zla ba 'phel ba bzhin du ste nges pa'o //

original: khros pa zhes bya ba ni chu'i rlabs lta bu'i byang chub kyi rlabs so //
analyzed: khros pa zhes bya ba ni chu'i rlabs lta bu'i byang chub kyi rlabs so //
translated: ‚ÄúAnger‚Äù is the wave of enlightenment, like a wave of water.

analyzed: dbang zhes bya ba ni chad pa med pa'i rgyun gyis sems rgya mtsho dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúPower‚Äù is the ocean of mind, with an uninterrupted flow.

original: de ltar myur du thams cad ster ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar myur du thams cad ster ba'o //
translated: Thus, everything is quickly given.

original: phyi rol du yang gang bsams pa de dbang du byed do //
analyzed: phyi rol du yang gang bsams pa de dbang du byed do //

original: de ltar a'a'i yi ge'i'o //
analyzed: de ltar a'a'i yi ge'i'o //
translated: Thus, the letter ƒÅ.

original: a'i'i yi ge'i gsungs pa /
analyzed: a'i'i yi ge'i gsungs pa /
translated: The letter ƒÅ has been explained.

original: bsam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: bsam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /

original: / bdun pa re'i yi ge gsungs pa /
analyzed: / bdun pa re'i yi ge gsungs pa /

original: l'i'i yi ge gsungs pa /

analyzed: mthun pa med ces bya ba la sogs pa ste gcig tu na bya ba thams cad las smos pa spros pa med pa nyid ma yin te de la mthun pa med de bdag dang bdag dang bdag gi ba la sogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi dngos po las skad
translated: Not in accord, and so on. In one way, it is not without elaboration because it is free from all activities. In that regard, it is not in accord with the worldly things of self, mine, and so on.

analyzed: cig gnas pa spangs pa ste thog ma nas skye pa med pas @281a * //

translated: That which arises from the mind is free from virtuous and nonvirtuous actions of the mind.

translated: Among all those, in whatever human and other rebirths exist in the three worlds, one should draw forth the bliss of the world with one's own mouth and, by the nature of the union of form and the self-consecration of signlessness, one should enjoy the bliss of the world.

original: de'i man ngag gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i man ngag gsungs pa /

original: dbugs med ri mo gzhan yid du //
analyzed: dbugs med ri mo gzhan yid du //

analyzed: de nyid yal ga ste h'um gi yi ge'i bdag nyid can des bya ba ste phyi mo'i gnas rang gi sems dam tshig gi dbang phyug gi stong ba nyid kyis lhan cig skyes pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
translated: That is the branch, which is the nature of the syllable h≈´·πÉ. By that, the action, the place of the mother, one‚Äôs mind, the emptiness of the pledge lord, enters into union with the connate.

original: des yang ring po aee'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: des yang ring po aee'i yi ge'o //
translated: By that, the long ƒÅ, the syllable ai.

original: mnyam pa'i rigs las zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa'i rigs las zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom the family of equality‚Äù is the ascertainment.

original: slar yang ao'i yi ge'i gsungs pa /
analyzed: slar yang ao'i yi ge'i gsungs pa /
translated: Again, the syllable o.

original: phyag rgyu chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste //
analyzed: phyag rgyu chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste //

original: gnyis ka stong pa mchog tu zag pa med ces bya ba ni ae'i yi ge dang aee'i yi ge de dag gis bshad pa'i rang bzhin gyis phyag rgya chen po 'grub ces bya ba gcig tu 'grub pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis ka stong pa mchog tu zag pa med ces bya ba ni ae'i yi ge dang aee'i yi ge de dag gis bshad pa'i rang bzhin gyis phyag rgya chen po 'grub ces bya ba gcig tu 'grub pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe supreme emptiness of both is immaculate‚Äù is the nature explained by those syllables ai and ai. The great seal is accomplished, that is, it is accomplished as one.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /

original: sangs rgyas ri mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas ri mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThe painting of the buddhas‚Äù and so on.

original: rtsa'i 'khor lo thams cad du aa wa h'um t'i thams cad 'gro ba 'og dang steng du de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rtsa'i 'khor lo thams cad du aa wa h'um t'i thams cad 'gro ba 'og dang steng du de de bzhin no //
translated: The entire movement of the a-ha·πÉ in all the cakras is below and above.

original: a'a li zhes bya ba ni 'og tu 'bab pa'o //
analyzed: a'a li zhes bya ba ni 'og tu 'bab pa'o //

original: k'a le zhes bya ba ni steng du 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: k'a le zhes bya ba ni steng du 'gro ba'o //
translated: The syllable kƒÅ means ‚Äúgoing up.‚Äù

original: mdor byas shing bsdus pas bcud len sgrub pa ste /
analyzed: mdor byas shing bsdus pas bcud len sgrub pa ste /
translated: The elixir is accomplished by means of the concise and the collected.

original: khams rnam par bzung bas lus kyi khams kyis thams cad zhu ba'i gzugs kyis bcud len du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khams rnam par bzung bas lus kyi khams kyis thams cad zhu ba'i gzugs kyis bcud len du 'gyur ro //

original: de ltar bdud rtsi rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i lha rnams la thig le'i gzugs khams med pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar bdud rtsi rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i lha rnams la thig le'i gzugs khams med pa ste /
translated: Thus, the elixir is the form of the bindu of the deities such as Vajrasattva and so forth, which is without elements.

original: tshim par bya ba ste nam mkha' la thim pa'i don to //
analyzed: tshim par bya ba ste nam mkha' la thim pa'i don to //
translated: It is the satisfaction, the meaning of which is ‚Äúdissolving into space.‚Äù

original: de'i 'og ces bya ba la sogs pas ao'i yi ge'i gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i 'og ces bya ba la sogs pas ao'i yi ge'i gsungs pa /
translated: The syllable o·πÉ and so forth are stated by ‚Äúafter that‚Äù and so forth.

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pas 'og gi gnas pa las @281b gzhan no //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pas 'og gi gnas pa las @281b gzhan no //
translated: ‚ÄúAfter that‚Äù means after the yogi‚Äôs lower state.

original: 'dir 'og gi sgras sngon gyi rang bzhin gyi rang gi sems las byung ba nam mkha'i bdag nyid can kyang ngo //
analyzed: 'dir 'og gi sgras sngon gyi rang bzhin gyi rang gi sems las byung ba nam mkha'i bdag nyid can kyang ngo //
translated: Here, the word ‚Äúlower‚Äù is also the nature of the previous, one‚Äôs own mind, which is of the nature of space.

original: de yang gzhan du yi ge thams cad gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba ste mchog tu zag pa med pa'i 'od gsal ba'i khar rab tu 'jug ba yod pas de ltar bskrun pa ste de de bzhin du bshad do//
analyzed: de yang gzhan du yi ge thams cad gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba ste mchog tu zag pa med pa'i 'od gsal ba'i khar rab tu 'jug ba yod pas de ltar bskrun pa ste de de bzhin du bshad do//
translated: Moreover, it is said that all the syllables should be placed elsewhere, that is, in the supreme, uncontaminated clear light, since they exist in the form of light rays that enter there.üîΩThus, they are generated in that way, and that is explained in that way.

original: snang ba yang dag par 'ong ba zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba nyid 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snang ba yang dag par 'ong ba zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba nyid 'gyur ro //
translated: The appearance of the pure coming is the nature of everything, clear light.

original: slar yang am gi yi ge gsungs pa /
analyzed: slar yang am gi yi ge gsungs pa /
translated: Again, the syllable A is stated:

original: rjes kyi dbyangs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rjes kyi dbyangs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The subsequent vowel, etc.

original: slar yang 'od gsal ba langs pa'i sems rjes kyi dbyangs kyi gzugs stong pa nyid kyi thig le'i rang bzhin du nges pa'o //
analyzed: slar yang 'od gsal ba langs pa'i sems rjes kyi dbyangs kyi gzugs stong pa nyid kyi thig le'i rang bzhin du nges pa'o //
translated: Again, the mind that has arisen from clear light is ascertained in the form of the subsequent vowel, which is the nature of the drop of emptiness.

original: thams cad du nye bar spyod cing 'byin cing sdud pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad du nye bar spyod cing 'byin cing sdud pa'o //
translated: It is the enjoyment and emanation of everything.

original: aa:'i yi ge'i gsungs pa /
analyzed: aa:'i yi ge'i gsungs pa /
translated: The syllable A is stated:üîΩThe moon, etc.

original: zla ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste 'og dang steng du zla ba gnyis ni rdo rje'i nor bu dang spyi gtsug tu ste /
analyzed: zla ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste 'og dang steng du zla ba gnyis ni rdo rje'i nor bu dang spyi gtsug tu ste /
translated: The two moons below and above are in the vajra jewel and the crown.

original: ji srid sems kyi thig le gnyis gcig tu gang 'dzom pa ste mnyam pa'i sbyor ba des gsungs pa'i phyag rgya chen po mchog tu zag pa med par mngon par brjod pas so //
analyzed: ji srid sems kyi thig le gnyis gcig tu gang 'dzom pa ste mnyam pa'i sbyor ba des gsungs pa'i phyag rgya chen po mchog tu zag pa med par mngon par brjod pas so //
translated: As long as the two drops of the mind are combined, that is, united in equality, by that, the supreme Great Seal, which is described as being without outflows, is attained.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
translated: Thus, and so on.

original: las zhes bya ba ni phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can du bya'o //
analyzed: las zhes bya ba ni phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can du bya'o //
translated: The action is to be understood as having an external and internal nature.

original: slar yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa aa'i yi ge la sogs pa dbyangs bcu drag rnams stong pa nyid kyi gzugs su rgang pa la sogs par sbyar zhing dgod pa gsungs so //
analyzed: slar yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa aa'i yi ge la sogs pa dbyangs bcu drag rnams stong pa nyid kyi gzugs su rgang pa la sogs par sbyar zhing dgod pa gsungs so //
translated: Again, and so on. The ten vowels beginning with the letter A are arranged in the form of emptiness and so on, and are placed in the body.

original: lus la zhes bya ba ni rim pa ji lta bas go bar bya ste nges pa'o //
analyzed: lus la zhes bya ba ni rim pa ji lta bas go bar bya ste nges pa'o //
translated: In the body, and so on. It is to be understood according to the sequence.

original: da ni ka'i yi ge la sogs pa nas ma'i yi ge'i bar du nyi shu rtsa lnga'i de kho na nyid kyi dbye bas las rnams gsungs pa slar yang re re'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: da ni ka'i yi ge la sogs pa nas ma'i yi ge'i bar du nyi shu rtsa lnga'i de kho na nyid kyi dbye bas las rnams gsungs pa slar yang re re'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Now, the actions are described by the divisions of the reality of the twenty-five letters from the letter Ka up to the letter Ma. Again, each, and so on.

original: nang du rgyun du bsgom par bya //
analyzed: nang du rgyun du bsgom par bya //
translated: One should meditate continuously on the inner.

original: zhes bya ba ni mgo bo pu ll'i ra la sogs pa nas pus mo'i bar du nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang yan lag thams cad de nyid shu rtsa lnga'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mgo bo pu ll'i ra la sogs pa nas pus mo'i bar du nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang yan lag thams cad de nyid shu rtsa lnga'o //
translated: Thus, from the head to the knees, there are twenty-four, and all the limbs are the twenty-fifth.

original: stong pa nyid de kho na nyid rig byed pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi sems kyi kun du spyod par mgo bo la sogs pa'i dbus mar rab tu zhugs par stong pa nyid mkhas pa rnams kyis mtshon par bya'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid de kho na nyid rig byed pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi sems kyi kun du spyod par mgo bo la sogs pa'i dbus mar rab tu zhugs par stong pa nyid mkhas pa rnams kyis mtshon par bya'o //
translated: The knower of emptiness should indicate the reality of emptiness in the middle of the head, etc., by means of one's own mental activity.

original: de ltar byas pas ka'i yi ge la sogs pa de bzhin du bshad do //
analyzed: de ltar byas pas ka'i yi ge la sogs pa de bzhin du bshad do //
translated: Thus, the letter ka, etc., are explained in the same way.

original: de ltar de rnams kyi de kho na nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar de rnams kyi de kho na nyid gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, having done so, he declares their reality:

original: bdag ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /üîΩma go bor ka'i yi ge'i bdag nyid kyi de kho na nyid do //üîΩkha'i yi ge dkyil 'khor @282a * //üîΩgyi de kho na nyed spyi gtsug tu'o //
analyzed: bdag ces bya ba la sogs pa ste / ma go bor ka'i yi ge'i bdag nyid kyi de kho na nyid do // kha'i yi ge dkyil 'khor @282a * // gyi de kho na nyed spyi gtsug tu'o //
translated: The self, etc.üîΩThe reality of the letter ka, etc., is not understood.üîΩThe reality of the letter kha is in the crown of the head.

original: ga'i yi ge lus kyi de kho na nyid rna ba g-yas par ro //
analyzed: ga'i yi ge lus kyi de kho na nyid rna ba g-yas par ro //
translated: The reality of the letter ga is in the right ear.

original: gha'i yi ge lha'i de kho na nyid rgyab kyi rgal tshigs su'o //
analyzed: gha'i yi ge lha'i de kho na nyid rgyab kyi rgal tshigs su'o //
translated: The letter Gha is the reality of the gods in the back of the spine.

original: da'i yi ge bla ma'i de kho na nyid rna ba g-yon par ro //
analyzed: da'i yi ge bla ma'i de kho na nyid rna ba g-yon par ro //
translated: The letter Dha is the reality of the guru in the left ear.

original: tsa'i yi ge sngags kyi de kho na nyid mig tu 'o /üîΩtsha'i yi ge rnam par shes pa'i de kho na nyid smin pa'i dbus su'o //
analyzed: tsa'i yi ge sngags kyi de kho na nyid mig tu 'o / tsha'i yi ge rnam par shes pa'i de kho na nyid smin pa'i dbus su'o //
translated: The letter Ca is the reality of the mantra in the eyes.üîΩThe letter Cha is the reality of consciousness in the middle of the eyebrows.

original: dza'i yi ge ye shes kyi de kho na nyid dpung pa'i rtsa bar ro //üîΩdzha'i yi ge dus kyi de kho na nyid mchan khung dag tu'o //
analyzed: dza'i yi ge ye shes kyi de kho na nyid dpung pa'i rtsa bar ro // dzha'i yi ge dus kyi de kho na nyid mchan khung dag tu'o //
translated: The letter Ja is the reality of gnosis in the base of the shoulders.üîΩThe letter Jha is the reality of time in the armpits.

original: nya'i yi ge rgyu'i de kho na nyid mgrin par ro //
analyzed: nya'i yi ge rgyu'i de kho na nyid mgrin par ro //
translated: The letter ·πÜa is the reality of the cause in the throat.

original: yi ge ta 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid snying gar ro //üîΩyi ge tha 'bigs pa po'i de kho na nyid khar ro //
analyzed: yi ge ta 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid snying gar ro // yi ge tha 'bigs pa po'i de kho na nyid khar ro //
translated: The letter Ta is the reality of the result in the heart.üîΩThe letter Tha is the reality of the piercer in the mouth.

original: yi ge da bcud len gyi de kho na nyid sna'i rtse mor ro //
analyzed: yi ge da bcud len gyi de kho na nyid sna'i rtse mor ro //
translated: The letter Da is the reality of the elixir in the tip of the nose.

original: yi ge dha zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi de kho na nyid nu ma zung la'o //
analyzed: yi ge dha zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi de kho na nyid nu ma zung la'o //
translated: The letter Dha is the reality of the actions of pacification and so on in the pair of breasts.

original: yi ge na gtor ma'i de kho na nyid lte bar ro //
analyzed: yi ge na gtor ma'i de kho na nyid lte bar ro //
translated: The letter ·πÜa is the reality of the bali in the navel.

original: yi ge ta sbyin sreg gi de kho na nyid mdoms su'o //üîΩyi ge tha phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid mtshan ma la'o //
analyzed: yi ge ta sbyin sreg gi de kho na nyid mdoms su'o // yi ge tha phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid mtshan ma la'o //
translated: The letter ta is the reality of the fire offering, in the genitals.üîΩThe letter tha is the reality of the seal, in the sex organ.

original: yi ge da dbang po'i de kho na nyid bshang bar ro //
analyzed: yi ge da dbang po'i de kho na nyid bshang bar ro //
translated: The letter da is the reality of the sense organ, in the anus.

original: yi ge dha dbu ma'i de kho na nyid bral dag la'o //
analyzed: yi ge dha dbu ma'i de kho na nyid bral dag la'o //
translated: The letter dha is the reality of the central channel, in the pure separation.

original: yi ge na sgyu ma'i de kho na nyid byin pa dag la'o //
analyzed: yi ge na sgyu ma'i de kho na nyid byin pa dag la'o //
translated: The letter na is the reality of illusion, in the hips.

original: yi ge pa chos thams cad mngon par mtshams sbyor pa'i de kho na nyid rkang pa'i bol dag la'o //
analyzed: yi ge pa chos thams cad mngon par mtshams sbyor pa'i de kho na nyid rkang pa'i bol dag la'o //
translated: The letter pa is the reality of the manifest connection of all phenomena, in the tops of the feet.

original: yi ge pha rigs kyi rim pa la sogs pa'i de kho na nyid sor mo rnams la'o //
analyzed: yi ge pha rigs kyi rim pa la sogs pa'i de kho na nyid sor mo rnams la'o //
translated: The letter pha is the reality of the stages of the family, and so on, in the fingers.

original: yi ge ba rus kyi de kho na nyid mthe bo dag la'o //
analyzed: yi ge ba rus kyi de kho na nyid mthe bo dag la'o //
translated: The letter ba is the reality of the bones, in the toes.

original: yi ge bha lung rjes su rig pa'i de kho na nyid pus mo gnyis dag la'o //
analyzed: yi ge bha lung rjes su rig pa'i de kho na nyid pus mo gnyis dag la'o //
translated: The letter bha is the reality of the subsequent knowledge of the scriptures, in the two knees.

original: yi ge ma mig 'phrul gyi de kho na nyid lus thams cad la'o //
analyzed: yi ge ma mig 'phrul gyi de kho na nyid lus thams cad la'o //
translated: The letter ma is the reality of the magic display, in the whole body.

original: de kho na nyid shu rtsa lnga po 'di yang phyin ci log tu l'a ma'i mtshan nyid kyi le'ur gsungs so //
analyzed: de kho na nyid shu rtsa lnga po 'di yang phyin ci log tu l'a ma'i mtshan nyid kyi le'ur gsungs so //
translated: These fifty realities are taught in the chapter on the characteristics of the yoginƒ´s.

original: de yis de ltar de kho na nyid shes rab chen pos shes par bya ba ste /
analyzed: de yis de ltar de kho na nyid shes rab chen pos shes par bya ba ste /
translated: One should know them in that way with great wisdom.

original: las mdzes pa zhes bya ba ni bshad pa rnams so //
analyzed: las mdzes pa zhes bya ba ni bshad pa rnams so //
translated: ‚ÄúThe work is beautiful‚Äù means the explanations.

original: rang bzhin brjod pa'i las zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin brjod pa'i las zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‚ÄúThe work of expressing the nature‚Äù

original: bshad pa'i gnas rnams su bsgrub pas brjod pa tsam gyis las sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: bshad pa'i gnas rnams su bsgrub pas brjod pa tsam gyis las sgrub par byed do //

original: yi ge de rnams kyi kha dog dus kyi me zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: yi ge de rnams kyi kha dog dus kyi me zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‚ÄúThe color of the letters is the fire of time‚Äù

translated: means the color of the fire at the time of the burning of the eon.

original: 'dir yang de de bzhin du bshad do //
analyzed: 'dir yang de de bzhin du bshad do //
translated: Here it is explained in the same way.

original: 'dir las rnams gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'dir las rnams gsungs pa /

original: dbang la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas te /
analyzed: dbang la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas te /
translated: ‚ÄúDominance, etc.‚Äù

analyzed: zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / rengs pa dang / gsad pa'o //
translated: refers to pacifying, increasing, paralyzing, and killing.üîΩ‚ÄúFive by five‚Äù

original: lnga lnga zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: lnga lnga zhes bya ba ni /
translated: means

original: ji srid nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bar te re re la lnga lngar @282b 'gyur bas so //
analyzed: ji srid nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bar te re re la lnga lngar @282b 'gyur bas so //

analyzed: de yang dbang po lnga dang / phung po dang / khams lnga dang / yul lnga dang / las kyi dbang po lnga rnams so //

original: de ltar dmar po zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ltar dmar po zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Thus, ‚Äúred‚Äù

original: dbang po lnga dbang du byed pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po lnga dbang du byed pa'o //
translated: is the five faculties.üîΩ‚ÄúBlack‚Äù

original: nag po zhes bya ba ni yul lnga gsod pa'o //
analyzed: nag po zhes bya ba ni yul lnga gsod pa'o //

original: dkar po zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dkar po zhes bya ba ni /

original: phung po lnga rnams kyi zhi bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: phung po lnga rnams kyi zhi bar byed pa'o //
translated: is the five aggregates.

original: ser po zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ser po zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‚ÄúYellow‚Äù

original: ljang gu zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ljang gu zhes bya ba ni /

original: de rnams kyi yon tan gyis de kho na nyid kyi yon tan du 'gro bas na dang / khams kyi las kyi yon tan rnams kyis yon tan nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid kyi de kho na nyid ni sngon du bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi yon tan gyis de kho na nyid kyi yon tan du 'gro bas na dang / khams kyi las kyi yon tan rnams kyis yon tan nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid kyi de kho na nyid ni sngon du bshad pa'o //
translated: Since those qualities go to the qualities of reality, and since the qualities of the elements' actions are the nature of the twenty-five qualities, reality is explained first.

original: des slar yang sgrub po'i bsgrub bya 'dod pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: des slar yang sgrub po'i bsgrub bya 'dod pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Again, the object of attainment of the adept is called desired.

original: 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yang sgrub par byed do zhes bya bar dgongs pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yang sgrub par byed do zhes bya bar dgongs pa'i don to //
